text: Devanand Konwar (1943 - 25 April 2020) was an Indian politician. In 2009, he became the Governor of West Bengal and Bihar. In 2010, he retired as West Bengal Governor. In 2013, he retired as Bihar Governor to become Governor of Tripura. He retired in 2014. Konwar died on 25 April 2020, aged 77.Assam: Former Bihar Governor Devanand Konwar passes away ==References== Category:1943 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Governors of Tripura Category:Governors of West Bengal
title: Devanand Konwar
